name: Rose Name Plate
shortDesc: Elegant rose engraving on birch ply with satin finish.
fullDesc: A classic name plate with a rose engraving. Finished with natural oils and wax for a warm satin sheen.

name: Mountain Wall Art
shortDesc: Layered mountain scene engraved on teak.
fullDesc: A serene mountain panorama with layered depths. Perfect for living room walls.

name: Ganesha Relief

name: Pet Portrait
